typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Chainlink.Request memory,bytes32,address,bytes4) pure returns (struct Chainlink.Request memory)

documentation.text:
@notice Sets the stored oracle address
 @param oracleAddress The address of the oracle contract

@notice Sets the LINK token address
 @param linkAddress The address of the LINK token contract

@notice Sets the Chainlink token address for the public
 network as given by the Pointer contract

@notice Retrieves the stored address of the LINK token
 @return The address of the LINK token

@notice Retrieves the stored address of the oracle contract
 @return The address of the oracle contract

@notice Sets the stored oracle contract with the address resolved by ENS
 @dev This may be called on its own as long as `useChainlinkWithENS` has been called previously

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Source must be the oracle of the request"

arguments.value: Source must be the oracle of the request

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Source must be the oracle of the request"

documentation.text:
@dev Reverts if the request is already pending
 @param requestId The request ID for fulfillment

natspec.notice: Contract writers can inherit this contract in order to create requests for the Chainlink network
natspec.title: The ChainlinkClient contract
